alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Western Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Addison, north central Rutland and northwestern Windsor Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brandon, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sudbury, Brandon, Leicester, Whiting, Goshen, Salisbury, Chittenden, Hubbardton, Ripton, Pittsford, Shoreham, Hancock, Orwell, Rochester, Huntley Island, Forest Dale, Branbury State Park, Lake Dunmore, Beartrap Island and East Shoreham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
